Uses of Class
md.SystemMD

  • Packages that use SystemMD 
    Package Description
    md
    Provides the classes to manage the information of MD system (residue, segment, box).
    molecule
    Provides the classes to manage the information of system.

    • Uses of SystemMD in md

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SystemMD Cluster.getCluster(int[] atomindex)
      Returns a cluster which is consisted of atoms given in the input.

      Returns the system of this reader
      SystemMD FileReaderMD.readAll()
      Reads the information from the specified file
